Intro to Religious Studies, Winter 2018

This is the webpage for Connie Kassor's RLST 100 course (Winter '18). Here is where you'll find readings, documents, and all information relevant to the course. If you want to find Connie outside of class, she's in Main Hall 411, and her office hours are Mondays 11am-Noon.

Week 10: I'm, like, spiritual but not religious

Monday, November 12

  • Jain, “Is Downward Dog the Path to Hell?” and “Claiming Yoga for India

Wednesday, November 14

  • King, “Seeing Spirituality in Chimpanzees”
  • No new reading, but come to class with your notes from the term. We’ll spend time reviewing what we’ve covered this term, in preparation for the final exam.
